mapper.insert: insert into board(writer, title, content) values(#{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
insert into uploadedfile(originFileName, newFileName, size, boardNo, thumbFileName) values(#{originalFileName}, #{newFileName}, #{fileSize}, #{boardNo}, #{thumbFileName})
mapper.select: select timestampdiff(hour, readTime, now()) from readcountprocess where ipAddr=#{ipAddr} and boardNo = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: update readcountprocess set readTime=now() where boardNo=#{boardNo} and ipAddr = #{ipAddr}
update board set readCount = readCount + 1 where no = #{no}
